_a-0000ed69-99d8-8000-9ba6-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_HomePage_Classification_GetDataForAreaOfImprovements
_a-0000ed69-99d8-8000-9ba6-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!gridData: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryRecordType_v1"(
    recordType: recordType!AIA Classification Model,
    fetchTotalCount: false(),
    pagingInfo: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pagingInfo"(
      startIndex: 1,
      batchSize: 3,
      sort: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(
        field: recordType!AIA Classification Model.publishedAccuracy,
        ascending: true()
      )
    ),
    filters: {
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
        field: recordType!AIA Classification Model.publishedAccuracy,
        operator: "not null"
      ),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
        field: recordType!AIA Classification Model.createdOn,
        operator: "between",
        value: {ri!selectedInterval.currrentStartDate,ri!selectedInterval.currentEndDate}
      )
    }
  ).data,
  if(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(value: local!gridData),
    {},
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: local!gridData,
      expression: if(
        fv!item[recordType!AIA Classification Model.publishedAccuracy] >= .8,
        {},
        a!map(
          modelName: fv!item[recordType!AIA Classification Model.name],
          modelId: fv!item[recordType!AIA Classification Model.modelId],
          accuracy: rule!AIA_DisplayPercentage(
            value: fv!item[recordType!AIA Classification Model.publishedAccuracy]
          ),
          backgroundColor: tostring(
            a!match(
              value: fv!item[recordType!AIA Classification Model.publishedAccuracy],
              whenTrue: fv!value > .5,
              then: ri!brandingMap.Yellow1,
              whenTrue: fv!value > .25,
              then: ri!brandingMap.Orange1,
              default: ri!brandingMap.Red1
            )
          ),
          icon: tostring(
            a!match(
              value: fv!item[recordType!AIA Classification Model.publishedAccuracy],
              whenTrue: fv!value > .5,
              then: "exclamation-triangle",
              whenTrue: fv!value > .25,
              then: "exclamation-triangle",
              default: "exclamation-circle"
            )
          ),
          color: tostring(
            a!match(
              value: fv!item[recordType!AIA Classification Model.publishedAccuracy],
              whenTrue: fv!value > .5,
              then: ri!brandingMap.Orange4,
              whenTrue: fv!value > .25,
              then: ri!brandingMap.Orange4,
              default: ri!brandingMap.Red4
            )
          ),
          highRange: concat(
            rule!AIA_HomePage_Classification_GetHighRangeForImprovementData(
              currentAccuracy: fv!item[recordType!AIA Classification Model.publishedAccuracy]
            ),
            "%"
          )
        )
      )
    )
  )
)

#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryRecordByIdentifier"(
  recordType: recordType!AIA Extraction Instance,
  identifier: ri!identifier,
  fields: a!flatten(
    {
      /* Extraction Instance */
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.modelVersionId,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.documentId,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.statusId,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.hasBoundingBoxes,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.boundingBoxesDocumentId,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.validationErrors,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.accuracy,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.precision,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.f1,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.recall,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.createdOn,
      /* Extraction Fields */
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.fields.modelVersionFieldId,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.fields.extractedValue,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.fields.overrideValue,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.fields.overrideNull,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.fields.boundingBox,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.fields.confidence,
      /* Extraction Fields > Rows */
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.fields.rows.overrideValue,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.fields.rows.boundingBox,
      /* Extraction Fields > Rows > Cells */
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.fields.rows.cells.modelVersionFieldId,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.fields.rows.cells.extractedValue,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.fields.rows.cells.overrideValue,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.fields.rows.cells.overrideNull,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.fields.rows.cells.confidence,
      /* Extraction Fields > Model Field */

      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.fields.modelVersionField.columns.key,
      /* Extraction Fields > Rows > Cells > Column */
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.fields.rows.cells.column.key,
      a!defaultValue(ri!additionalFields, {})
    },
    
  )
)

_a-0000ed46-3c8c-8000-9bac-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_UTIL_Filter
_a-0000ed46-3c8c-8000-9bac-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!fieldValuePairs: a!defaultValue(
    ri!fieldValuePairs,
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: a!flatten(ri!field),
      expression: a!map(
        field: fv!item,
        value: if(
          fv!itemCount = 1,
          ri!value,
          index(a!flatten(ri!value), fv!index, null)
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  local!matchIndices: if(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(a!flatten(ri!records)),
    tointeger({}),
    reduce(
      rule!AIA_UTIL_Filter_Reducer(
        previousIndices: _,
        records: a!flatten(ri!records),
        fieldValuePair: _
      ),
      enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!records))) + 1,
      local!fieldValuePairs
    )
  ),
  local!rejectIndices: difference(
    if(
      a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!records),
      tointeger({}),
      enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!records))) + 1
    ),
    local!matchIndices
  ),
  local!matches: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),
    index(ri!records, local!matchIndices, {})
  ),
  local!rejects: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),
    index(ri!records, local!rejectIndices, {})
  ),
  a!match(
    value: a!defaultValue(ri!filterType, "FILTER"),
    equals: "FILTER",
    then: local!matches,
    equals: "REJECT",
    then: local!rejects,
    equals: "FIRST_MATCH",
    then: index(local!matches, 1, null),
    equals: "FIRST_REJECT",
    then: index(local!rejects, 1, null),
    equals: "MATCH_COUNT",
    then: count(local!matchIndices),
    equals: "REJECT_COUNT",
    then: count(local!rejectIndices),
    equals: "MATCH_INDICES",
    then: local!matchIndices,
    equals: "REJECT_INDICES",
    then: local!rejectIndices,
    equals: "FULL_RESULT",
    then: a!map(
      matches: local!matches,
      rejects: local!rejects,
      firstMatch: index(local!matches, 1, null),
      firstReject: index(local!rejects, 1, null),
      matchCount: count(local!matchIndices),
      rejectCount: count(local!rejectIndices),
      matchIndices: local!matchIndices,
      rejectIndices: local!rejectIndices
    ),
    default: fn!error(
      "Invalid filterType, must be one of: FILTER, REJECT, FIRST_MATCH, FIRST_REJECT, MATCH_COUNT, REJECT_COUNT, MATCH_INDICES, REJECT_INDICES, FULL_RESULT"
    )
  )
)

_a-0000edb4-d4ac-8000-9bae-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_ExtractionModel_GetAlertingTestInstanceCount
_a-0000edb4-d4ac-8000-9bae-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!testInstances: rule!SHRD_UTIL_QueryRecord(
    recordType: recordType!AIA Extraction Instance,
    returnType: "OBJECT_ARRAY",
    executeWhen: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!model),
    fields: {
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.id,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.statusId,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.correctFieldCount,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.totalFieldCount,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.modelVersion.extractionModel.fieldsCount
    },
    filters: {
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
        field: recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.modelVersion.versionId,
        operator: "<=",
        value: ri!modelVersion[recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.versionId],
        applyWhen: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!modelVersion)
      ),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
        field: recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.modelVersion.modelId,
        operator: "=",
        value: ri!model[recordType!AIA Extraction Model.modelId]
      ),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
        field: recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.modelTestSuiteCase.modelTestSuiteId,
        operator: "=",
        value: ri!testSuiteId,
        applyWhen: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!testSuiteId)
      ),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
        field: recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.testInstance,
        operator: "=",
        value: true
      )
    }
  ),
  local!alertingTestInstances: a!flatten(
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: local!testInstances,
      expression: if(
        and(
          contains(cons!AIA_INSTANCE_STATUS_RECONCILED_ALL,fv!item[recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.statusId]),
          fv!item[recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.modelVersion.extractionModel.fieldsCount] = fv!item[recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.totalFieldCount]
        ),
        {},
        fv!item
      )
    )
  ),
  a!defaultValue(
    value: rule!SHRD_UTIL_length(local!alertingTestInstances),
    default: 0
  )
)

_a-0000ecea-6c5f-8000-9c4b-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_CalculatedFieldPrompt
_a-0000ecea-6c5f-8000-9c4b-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
="You are an AI assistant and an expert at calculating new values based on provided input data. Your task is to use the data in the document snippet to calculate the values for a specific list of fields.

------------

## Output Format

Your final output must be a single **JSON object** that strictly adheres to the schema below. The root object will contain a key for each field you are asked to calculate.

```json
" & rule!AIA_Extraction_CreateJsonSchema(
  ExtractionModelVersion: ri!ModelVersion,
  mode: cons!AIA_PROMPT_MODE_CALCULATED,
  returnJson: true
) & "
```

------------

## Instructions

-   **Only use the data found within the section `[Input Data]` to derive your calculations. Do not infer or use outside knowledge."

_a-0000edd9-a94f-8000-9bb2-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_DocumentationSplash

_a-0000ec1e-9975-8000-9bd6-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_PercentageColor
_a-0000ec1e-9975-8000-9bd6-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!valueAsDecimal: if(
    ri!isPercentage = false,
    ri!value / 100,
    ri!value
  ),
  local!comparisonValue: if(
    ri!isInverted = true,
    1 - local!valueAsDecimal,
    local!valueAsDecimal
  ),
  a!match(
    value: local!comparisonValue,
    whenTrue: fv!value > 1000,
    then: null,
    whenTrue: a!isNullOrEmpty(fv!value),
    then: if(
      ri!isBackground,
      "NONE",
      null
    ),
    whenTrue: fv!value < .25,
    then: if(
      ri!isBackground,
      "ERROR",
      "#DE0037"
    ),
    whenTrue: fv!value < .5,
    then: if(
      ri!isBackground,
      "WARN",
      cons!AIA_WARN_COLOR
    ),
    whenTrue: fv!value < .8,
    then: if(
      ri!isBackground,
      "INFO",
      "#1d659c"
    ),
    whenTrue: fv!value = 1,
    then: if(
      ri!isBackground,
      "SUCCESS",
      "#169602"
    ),
    whenTrue: fv!value >= .8,
    then: if(
      ri!isBackground,
      "SUCCESS",
      "#1CC101"
    ),
    default: "NONE"
  )
)

a!match(

  default: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:6424f5ba-8395-4195-a7c1-ad514804cd6e"(#"urn:appian:translation-variable:v1:d56a42ea-37ed-4d07-85a8-d7e4500a7265": ri!fieldCount)
) & if(
  ri!includeVerb,
  if(
    ri!fieldCount = 1,
    " " & #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:5345174e-686d-4f11-9ced-b3db371becc2",
    " " & #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:1aa3aa35-0c49-4c9e-87da-40a4e1341611"

)

_a-0000ee5d-151c-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_AiReviewPromptFixed
_a-0000ee5d-151c-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
"## Task Overview
1. Analyze the provided source document carefully
2. Compare the extracted data (provided as JSON) against the source document field by field
3. Determine if each extracted value is correct based on the source document
4. Provide corrected values where necessary
5. Output a structured JSON with verification results

## Input
A source document containing the original information
JSON data previously extracted from the document

## Output Format

Your final output must be a single **JSON object** representing the original data, with each field enriched to include its location. The schema for an enriched field is as follows:

```json
" & rule!AIA_Extraction_CreateJsonSchema(
  ExtractionModelVersion: ri!ModelVersion,
  mode: cons!AIA_SCHEMA_MODE_AI_REVIEW,
  returnJson: true,
  includeArrays: false
) & "
```

## Verification Guidelines
* Be thorough and precise in your verification
* Check exact values, not just approximate matches
* For dates, verify the value against the ISO extracted date value.  **Do not return errors for dates not matching the correct format**
* For monetary amounts, verify the exact number
* For text fields, verify the exact spelling and formatting
* For arrays, verify each item and its fields individually

------------

## Instructions

1.  **Analyze the source document** provided.
2.  **Review the extracted data** provided under `[EXTRACTED DATA]`.
3.  **Only return fields referenced in the output format, make sure the output json matches the Output Format schema.
4.  **For each field referenced in the output schema** (including nested fields within `arrays`), create an object containing three keys: `value`, `isCorrect`, and `reasoning`.
    * `extractedValue`: This should be value original extracted from the document before the review.
    * `suggestedValue`: This should be the **correct** value as found in the document. If the original extraction was wrong, you must provide the correct value here. If the **correct** value should be blank, return back "".
    * `isCorrect`: A boolean (`true` or `false`). Set to `true` if the originally extracted data matches the document, and `false` otherwise.
    * `reasoning`: A brief string explaining your decision. If correct, state where you found the information (e.g., ""The invoice number matches the value at the top right of the document.""). If incorrect, explain the discrepancy (e.g., ""The extracted date was 2023-10-26, but the document clearly shows 2023-10-27."").
"

AIA_FieldJsonSchema
_a-0000ee5d-151c-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!isMultiple: a!defaultValue(
    ri!item.isMultiple,
    false
  ),
  local!baseType: #"53aa98e0-80da-4eb1-88f9-a989a8fe1aee"(
    type: ri!item.type
  ),
  local!baseField: a!map(
    title: ri!item.label,
    description: ri!item.description,
    type: local!baseType.type,
    format: local!baseType.format
  ),
  local!schemaType: displayValue(
    ri!mode,
    rule!AIA_ENUM_FieldSchemas().name,
    rule!AIA_ENUM_FieldSchemas(),
    null
  ),
  local!type: #"53aa98e0-80da-4eb1-88f9-a989a8fe1aee"(
    type: ri!item.type,
    isMultiple: local!isMultiple,
    includeArrays: ri!includeArrays,
    mode: ri!mode
  ),
  local!enum: rule!AIA_Extraction_GetFieldOptions(ModelVersionField: ri!item),
  local!columns: reject(
    fn!isnull,
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      ri!item.columns,
      a!match(
        value: fv!item,
        whenTrue: a!isNullOrEmpty(index(fv!value, "key", null)),
        then: null,
        whenTrue: and(
          ri!operation = cons!AIA_PROMPT_OPERATION_MODE_MULTIMODAL,
          a!defaultValue(fv!value.useVision, false) = true
        ),
        then: fv!item,
        whenTrue: and(
          ri!operation = cons!AIA_PROMPT_OPERATION_MODE_TEXT,
          a!defaultValue(fv!value.useVision, false) = false
        ),
        then: fv!item,
        default: fv!item
      )
    )
  ),
  local!properties: if(
    and(
      a!isNotNullOrEmpty(local!schemaType.fields),
      or(
        and(
          not(local!isMultiple),
          a!isNullOrEmpty(local!columns),
        ),
        not(a!defaultValue(ri!includeArrays, true))
      )
    ),
    reduce(
      #"urn:appian:function:v1:a:update",
      a!map(),
      merge(
        local!schemaType.fields.key,
        a!flatten({
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
            local!schemaType.fields,
            a!map(
              type: a!defaultValue(fv!item.type, local!baseField.type),
              description: fv!item.description,
              format: if(
                fv!item.useFormat,
                local!baseField.format,
                null
              ),
              items: if(
                and(
                  a!isNullOrEmpty(fv!item.type),
                  ri!includeArrays = false
                ),
                rule!AIA_FieldJsonSchema(
                  item: ri!item,
                  mode: cons!AIA_SCHEMA_MODE_PLAIN,
                  operation: ri!operation,
                  includeArrays: true
                ).items,
                null
              ),
              enum: if(
                fv!item.useFormat,
                index(local!enum, "options", null),
                null
              ),
            )
          )
        })
      )
    ),
    null
  ),
  local!required: if(
    and(
      a!isNotNullOrEmpty(local!schemaType.fields),
      a!isNullOrEmpty(local!columns),
      not(local!isMultiple)
    ),
    reject(
      fn!isnull,
      index(
        local!schemaType.fields.key,
        where(local!schemaType.fields.required)
      )
    ),
    null
  ),
  local!items: a!match(
    value: ri!includeArrays,
    equals: false,
    then: null,
    whenTrue: and(
      a!isNotNullOrEmpty(local!columns),
      ri!includeArrays
    ),
    then: a!map(
      type: "object",
      properties: reduce(
        #"urn:appian:function:v1:a:update",
        a!map(),
        merge(
          local!columns.key,
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
            local!columns,
            rule!AIA_FieldJsonSchema(
              item: fv!item,
              mode: ri!mode
            )
          )
        )
      ),
      required: reject(
        fn!isnull,
        index(
          local!columns.key,
          where(local!columns.required)
        )
      )
    ),
    whenTrue: local!isMultiple,
    then: a!localVariables(
      local!item: rule!AIA_FieldJsonSchema(
        item: #"urn:appian:function:v1:a:update"(
          ri!item, 
          {"label", "description", "isMultiple"},
          {null, null, false}
        ),
        mode: ri!mode
      ),
      if(
        and(
          a!isNullOrEmpty(local!schemaType.fields),
          a!isNotNullOrEmpty(local!enum)
        ),
        #"urn:appian:function:v1:a:update"(
          local!item,
          "enum",
          index(local!enum, "options", null),
        ),
        local!item
      )
    ),
    default: null
  ),
  a!map(
    title: local!baseField.title,
    description: local!baseField.description,
    type: local!type.type,
    format: local!type.format,
    properties: local!properties,
    items: local!items,
    required: local!required
  )
)

_a-0000ed69-99d8-8000-9ba6-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_HomePage_Extraction_GetDataForAreaOfImprovements
_a-0000ed69-99d8-8000-9ba6-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!gridData: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryRecordType_v1"(
    recordType: recordType!AIA Extraction Model,
    fetchTotalCount: false(),
    pagingInfo: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pagingInfo"(
      startIndex: 1,
      batchSize: 3,
      sort: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(
        field: recordType!AIA Extraction Model.publishedVersionAccuracy,
        ascending: true()
      )
    ),
    filters: {
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
        field: recordType!AIA Extraction Model.publishedVersionAccuracy,
        operator: "not null"
      ),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
        field: recordType!AIA Extraction Model.createdOn,
        operator: "between",
        value: {ri!selectedInterval.currrentStartDate,ri!selectedInterval.currentEndDate}
      )
    }
  ).data,
  if(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(value: local!gridData),
    {},
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: local!gridData,
      expression: if(
        fv!item[recordType!AIA Extraction Model.publishedVersionAccuracy] >= .8,
        {},
        a!map(
          modelName: fv!item[recordType!AIA Extraction Model.name],
          modelId: fv!item[recordType!AIA Extraction Model.modelId],
          accuracy: rule!AIA_DisplayPercentage(
            value: fv!item[recordType!AIA Extraction Model.publishedVersionAccuracy]
          ),
          backgroundColor: tostring(
            a!match(
              value: fv!item[recordType!AIA Extraction Model.publishedVersionAccuracy],
              whenTrue: fv!value > .5,
              then: ri!brandingMap.Yellow1,
              whenTrue: fv!value > .25,
              then: ri!brandingMap.Orange1,
              default: ri!brandingMap.Red1
            )
          ),
          icon: tostring(
            a!match(
              value: fv!item[recordType!AIA Extraction Model.publishedVersionAccuracy],
              whenTrue: fv!value > .5,
              then: "exclamation-triangle",
              whenTrue: fv!value > .25,
              then: "exclamation-triangle",
              default: "exclamation-circle"
            )
          ),
          color: tostring(
            a!match(
              value: fv!item[recordType!AIA Extraction Model.publishedVersionAccuracy],
              whenTrue: fv!value > .5,
              then: ri!brandingMap.Orange4,
              whenTrue: fv!value > .25,
              then: ri!brandingMap.Orange4,
              default: ri!brandingMap.Red4
            )
          ),
          highRange: concat(
            rule!AIA_HomePage_Extraction_GetHighRangeForImprovementData(
              currentAccuracy: fv!item[recordType!AIA Extraction Model.publishedVersionAccuracy]
            ),
            "%"
          )
        )
      )
    )
  )
)

_a-0000ed46-3c8c-8000-9bac-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!match(
  value: ri!value,
  whenTrue: a!defaultValue(ri!isNotTracked, false),
  then: a!map(
    textColor: ri!brandingMap.Gray3,
    backgroundColor: ri!brandingMap.Gray0,
    percentage: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:9de5298b-f6d7-4784-88ee-66469af68930",
    iconColor: ri!brandingMap.Gray3
  ),
  /*If Percentage Greater for 1000*/
  whenTrue: ri!value > 1000,
  then: null,
  /*If Percentage is null*/
  whenTrue: a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!value),
  then: a!map(
    textColor: ri!brandingMap.Gray3,
    backgroundColor: ri!brandingMap.Gray0,
    percentage: rule!AIA_DisplayPercentage(value: ri!value),
    iconColor: ri!brandingMap.Gray3
  ),
  /*If Percentage is greater than .8*/
  whenTrue: ri!value > .8,
  then: a!map(
    textColor: ri!brandingMap.Green4,
    backgroundColor: ri!brandingMap.Green1,
    percentage: rule!AIA_DisplayPercentage(value: ri!value),
    iconColor: ri!brandingMap.Green4
  ),
  /*If Percentage greater than .5*/
  whenTrue: ri!value > .5,
  then: a!map(
    textColor: ri!brandingMap.Yellow4,
    backgroundColor: ri!brandingMap.Yellow1,
    percentage: rule!AIA_DisplayPercentage(value: ri!value),
    iconColor: ri!brandingMap.Yellow4
  ),
  /*If Percentage greater than .25*/
  whenTrue: ri!value > .25,
  then: a!map(
    textColor: ri!brandingMap.Orange4,
    backgroundColor: ri!brandingMap.Orange1,
    percentage: rule!AIA_DisplayPercentage(value: ri!value),
    iconColor: ri!brandingMap.Orange4
  ),
  /*If Percentage is less than .25*/
  default: a!map(
    textColor: ri!brandingMap.Red4,
    backgroundColor: ri!brandingMap.Red1,
    percentage: rule!AIA_DisplayPercentage(value: ri!value),
    iconColor: ri!brandingMap.Red4
  )
)

_a-0000ef36-91aa-8000-9e87-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_UTIL_customPaging
_a-0000ef36-91aa-8000-9e87-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
  labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
  value: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextIcon"(
      icon: "angle-double-left",
      altText: if(
        ri!pagingInfo.startIndex = 1,
        null,
        #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:48c246f1-1be1-41e7-8372-03ae65153a43"
      ),
      link: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dynamicLink"(
        saveInto: { a!save(ri!pagingInfo.startIndex, 1) },
        showWhen: not(ri!pagingInfo.startIndex = 1)
      ),
      linkStyle: "STANDALONE",
      color: if(
        ri!pagingInfo.startIndex = 1,
        ri!brandingMap.SecondaryTextColor,
        ri!brandingMap.AccentColor
      ),
      size: ri!size
    ),
    " ",
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextIcon"(
      icon: "angle-left",
      altText: if(
        ri!pagingInfo.startIndex = 1,
        null,
        #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:6314de64-485a-4b3b-9189-24a7f02aab91"
      ),
      link: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dynamicLink"(
        saveInto: {
          a!save(
            ri!pagingInfo.startIndex,
            max(
              1,
              ri!pagingInfo.startIndex - ri!pagingInfo.batchSize
            )
          )
        },
        showWhen: not(ri!pagingInfo.startIndex = 1)
      ),
      linkStyle: "STANDALONE",
      color: if(
        ri!pagingInfo.startIndex = 1,
        ri!brandingMap.SecondaryTextColor,
        ri!brandingMap.AccentColor
      ),
      size: ri!size
    ),
    " ",
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
      text: {
        min(ri!pagingInfo.startIndex, ri!totalCount),
        " - ",
        min(
          ri!pagingInfo.startIndex + ri!pagingInfo.batchSize - 1,
          ri!totalCount
        )
      },
      size: ri!size,
      style: "STRONG"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
      text: {
        " ",
        #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:4090892b-9ae4-454c-9f24-361f8bb62d31",
        " ",
        text(ri!totalCount, "###,###,###,###,###")
      },
      size: ri!size
    ),
    " ",
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextIcon"(
      icon: "angle-right",
      altText: if(
        ri!pagingInfo.startIndex + ri!pagingInfo.batchSize - 1 >= ri!totalCount,
        null,
        #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:060be503-e9e9-4b99-bac2-3173694b1834"
      ),
      link: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dynamicLink"(
        saveInto: {
          a!save(
            ri!pagingInfo.startIndex,
            ri!pagingInfo.startIndex + ri!pagingInfo.batchSize
          )
        },
        showWhen: not(
          ri!pagingInfo.startIndex + ri!pagingInfo.batchSize - 1 >= ri!totalCount
        )
      ),
      linkStyle: "STANDALONE",
      color: if(
        ri!pagingInfo.startIndex + ri!pagingInfo.batchSize - 1 >= ri!totalCount,
        ri!brandingMap.SecondaryTextColor,
        ri!brandingMap.AccentColor
      ),
      size: ri!size
    ),
    " ",
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextIcon"(
      icon: "angle-double-right",
      altText: if(
        ri!pagingInfo.startIndex + ri!pagingInfo.batchSize - 1 >= ri!totalCount,
        null,
        #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:bcaac451-4d36-41ed-a882-eb85331dd94e"
      ),
      link: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dynamicLink"(
        saveInto: {
          a!save(
            ri!pagingInfo.startIndex,
            if(
              mod(ri!totalCount, ri!pagingInfo.batchSize) = 0,
              ri!totalCount - ri!pagingInfo.batchSize + 1,
              ri!totalCount - mod(ri!totalCount, ri!pagingInfo.batchSize) + 1
            )
          )
        },
        showWhen: not(
          ri!pagingInfo.startIndex + ri!pagingInfo.batchSize - 1 >= ri!totalCount
        )
      ),
      linkStyle: "STANDALONE",
      color: if(
        ri!pagingInfo.startIndex + ri!pagingInfo.batchSize - 1 >= ri!totalCount,
        ri!brandingMap.SecondaryTextColor,
        ri!brandingMap.AccentColor
      ),
      size: ri!size
    )
  },
  showWhen: ri!totalCount > 0,
  align: "RIGHT"
)

_a-0000edb4-d4ac-8000-9bae-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_getIntervalsForDateFilter
_a-0000edb4-d4ac-8000-9bae-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/* Data dictionary 
 * label (text) - display label of interval in dropdown
 
 *** example in AIA_ExtractionModelVersion_StraightThroughProcessingMetricsCard 
 *** for trend shaped directly by interval aggregation (not using weeks which are unsupported by query aggregation)
 * aggregationInterval (text) - a!grouping interval for querying data
 * intervalDates (List of Dates) - ordered list of all dates for aggregationInterval expected with currentStart/EndDate range.
 *     Must match expected style/return of selected aggregationInterval (i.e MONTH_DATE returns first day of each month within range)
 * intervalFormat (text) - text() style to use when formatting intervalDate for chart category 
 
 *** used in all interval queries
 * currrentStartDate (dateTime) - start datetime for current interval query filter
 * currrentEndDate (dateTime) - end datetime for current interval query filter
 
 *** used in token trends on homempage and prompt displays
 *** for non standard by-week groupings that can't be done automatically in queryAggregation
 * previousStartDate (dateTime) - start datetime for interval prior to current for diff calculation
 * previousEndDate (dateTime) - end datetime for interval prior to current for diff calculation
 * identifier (integer) - unique id for interval
 * secondaryKPILabel (text) - secondary display label
 * numWeeks (integer) - count of weeks within range for data seperation
 * weeklyGroups (List of Map) - list of start and end dates for each week in interval for custom aggregations
*/

a!localVariables(
  local!inputDate: today(),
  {
    a!map(
      label: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:74a2a818-84a0-43c9-ae15-58edc9824c8d"(
        #"urn:appian:translation-variable:v1:426f489f-72ed-4a46-9227-3d761bca9382": 30
      ),
      aggregationInterval: "DATE",
      intervalDates: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        items: enumerate(30),
        expression: today() - 30 + fv!index
      ),
      intervalFormat: "mmm dd",
      currrentStartDate: rule!AIA_UTIL_convertDateToDateTime(
        dateValue: today() - 29,
        isStartOfDay: true()
      ),
      currentEndDate: rule!AIA_UTIL_convertDateToDateTime(dateValue: today(), isStartOfDay: false()),
      previousStartDate: rule!AIA_UTIL_convertDateToDateTime(
        dateValue: today() - 59,
        isStartOfDay: true()
      ),
      previousEndDate: rule!AIA_UTIL_convertDateToDateTime(
        dateValue: today() - 30,
        isStartOfDay: false()
      ),
      identifier: 1,
      secondaryKPILabel: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:03b3e703-00ee-4b8b-8f83-9209337d9407"(
        #"urn:appian:translation-variable:v1:d41a5125-5a98-418d-8f23-c9949dc2144c": 30
      ),
      numWeeks: 4,
      weeklyGroups: append(
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
          items: enumerate(4),
          expression: {
            startDate: rule!AIA_UTIL_convertDateToDateTime(
              dateValue: today() - 29,
              isStartOfDay: true()
            ) + (7 * fv!item),
            endDate: rule!AIA_UTIL_convertDateToDateTime(
              dateValue: today() - 29,
              isStartOfDay: false()
            ) + (7 * fv!item + 6)
          }
        ),
        {
          startDate: rule!AIA_UTIL_convertDateToDateTime(
            dateValue: today() - 1,
            isStartOfDay: true()
          ),
          endDate: rule!AIA_UTIL_convertDateToDateTime(dateValue: today(), isStartOfDay: false())
        }
      )
    ),
    a!map(
      label: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:74a2a818-84a0-43c9-ae15-58edc9824c8d"(
        #"urn:appian:translation-variable:v1:426f489f-72ed-4a46-9227-3d761bca9382": 60
      ),
      aggregationInterval: "DATE",
      intervalDates: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        items: enumerate(60),
        expression: today() - 60 + fv!index
      ),
      intervalFormat: "mmm dd",
      currrentStartDate: rule!AIA_UTIL_convertDateToDateTime(
        dateValue: today() - 59,
        isStartOfDay: true()
      ),
      currentEndDate: rule!AIA_UTIL_convertDateToDateTime(dateValue: today(), isStartOfDay: false),
      previousStartDate: rule!AIA_UTIL_convertDateToDateTime(
        dateValue: today() - 119,
        isStartOfDay: true()
      ),
      previousEndDate: rule!AIA_UTIL_convertDateToDateTime(
        dateValue: today() - 60,
        isStartOfDay: false()
      ),
      identifier: 2,
      secondaryKPILabel: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:03b3e703-00ee-4b8b-8f83-9209337d9407"(
        #"urn:appian:translation-variable:v1:d41a5125-5a98-418d-8f23-c9949dc2144c": 60
      ),
      numWeeks: 8,
      weeklyGroups: append(
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
          items: enumerate(8),
          expression: {
            startDate: rule!AIA_UTIL_convertDateToDateTime(
              dateValue: today() - 59,
              isStartOfDay: true()
            ) + (7 * fv!item),
            endDate: rule!AIA_UTIL_convertDateToDateTime(
              dateValue: today() - 59,
              isStartOfDay: false()
            ) + (7 * fv!item + 6)
          }
        ),
        {
          startDate: rule!AIA_UTIL_convertDateToDateTime(
            dateValue: today() - 3,
            isStartOfDay: true()
          ),
          endDate: rule!AIA_UTIL_convertDateToDateTime(dateValue: today(), isStartOfDay: false())
        }
      )
    ),
    a!map(
      label: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:74a2a818-84a0-43c9-ae15-58edc9824c8d"(
        #"urn:appian:translation-variable:v1:426f489f-72ed-4a46-9227-3d761bca9382": 90
      ),
      aggregationInterval: "DATE",
      intervalDates: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        items: enumerate(90),
        expression: today() - 90 + fv!index
      ),
      intervalFormat: "mmm dd",
      currrentStartDate: rule!AIA_UTIL_convertDateToDateTime(
        dateValue: today() - 89,
        isStartOfDay: true()
      ),
      currentEndDate: rule!AIA_UTIL_convertDateToDateTime(dateValue: today(), isStartOfDay: false()),
      previousStartDate: rule!AIA_UTIL_convertDateToDateTime(
        dateValue: today() - 179,
        isStartOfDay: true()
      ),
      previousEndDate: rule!AIA_UTIL_convertDateToDateTime(
        dateValue: today() - 90,
        isStartOfDay: false()
      ),
      identifier: 3,
      secondaryKPILabel: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:03b3e703-00ee-4b8b-8f83-9209337d9407"(
        #"urn:appian:translation-variable:v1:d41a5125-5a98-418d-8f23-c9949dc2144c": 90
      ),
      numWeeks: 12,
      weeklyGroups: append(
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
          items: enumerate(12),
          expression: {
            startDate: rule!AIA_UTIL_convertDateToDateTime(
              dateValue: today() - 89,
              isStartOfDay: true()
            ) + (7 * fv!item),
            endDate: rule!AIA_UTIL_convertDateToDateTime(
              dateValue: today() - 89,
              isStartOfDay: false()
            ) + (7 * fv!item + 6)
          }
        ),
        {
          startDate: rule!AIA_UTIL_convertDateToDateTime(
            dateValue: today() - 5,
            isStartOfDay: true()
          ),
          endDate: rule!AIA_UTIL_convertDateToDateTime(dateValue: today(), isStartOfDay: false())
        }
      )
    ),
    a!map(
      label: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:f5eca8bb-66c4-4925-9a10-c2a74b4a1227",
      aggregationInterval: "MONTH_DATE",
      intervalDates: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        items: enumerate(
          elapsedmonths(
            rule!AIA_UTIL_convertDateToDateTime(
              dateValue: date(year(today()), 1, 1),
              isStartOfDay: true()
            ),
            now()
          ) + 1
        ),
        expression: date(year(today()),fv!index, 1)
      ),
      intervalFormat: "mmm",
      currrentStartDate: rule!AIA_UTIL_convertDateToDateTime(
        dateValue: date(year(today()), 1, 1),
        isStartOfDay: true()
      ),
      currentEndDate: rule!AIA_UTIL_convertDateToDateTime(dateValue: today(), isStartOfDay: false()),
      previousStartDate: rule!AIA_UTIL_convertDateToDateTime(
        dateValue: date(year(today()) - 1, 1, 1),
        isStartOfDay: true()
      ),
      previousEndDate: rule!AIA_UTIL_convertDateToDateTime(
        dateValue: date(year(today()) - 1, 12, 31),
        isStartOfDay: false()
      ),
      identifier: 4,
      secondaryKPILabel: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:7922f723-db73-4942-8297-0cf80875e5ff"(
        #"urn:appian:translation-variable:v1:268d5356-d5df-4932-92dc-91ecd7ede39f": #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:442ac098-88b9-4378-bd5f-c48386e12292"
      ),
      numWeeks: 0,
      weeklyGroups: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        items: enumerate(month(local!inputDate)),
        expression: {
          label: text(
            date(year(local!inputDate), fv!item + 1, 1),
            "MMM"
          ),
          startDate: rule!AIA_UTIL_convertDateToDateTime(
            dateValue: date(year(local!inputDate), fv!item + 1, 1),
            isStartOfDay: true()
          ),
          endDate: rule!AIA_UTIL_convertDateToDateTime(
            dateValue: eomonth(
              date(year(local!inputDate), fv!item + 1, 1),
              0
            ),
            isStartOfDay: false()
          )
        }
      )
    )
  }
)

_a-0000ee66-4fc0-8000-9baa-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_LlmOptionField
_a-0000ee66-4fc0-8000-9baa-011c48011c48_.sail_code:

      ri!value,

    validations: if(
      local!notFound,

    ),
    placeholder: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:efc088df-03da-46cb-a23f-3dfc806289d4",

)
